channel.title: Please help! Serious error! :S
channel.description:
Right, i get this error when i try to run my server:
[code]##### is now online! Players may now join! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:126) [/code]
(Taken out the server name) ([b]#####[/b])
This stops me from being able to log on, and it just "black-screens" my client... However, i don't get any errors when compiling :S
Have a look... [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/268/errorhkh.jpg/][IMG]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/2161/errorhkh.jpg[/img][/URL]
I'm hoping someone will be able to help me with this... because it stops me from being able to log onto my own server :S Thanks in advance!

item.title: Please help! Serious error! :S
item.dc:creator: @CoreVersion CoreVersion
item.description:
@CoreVersion wrote:

I am using tabs :S
Maybe i missed one or two, is that what the error is telling me? :S

Read full topic

item.title: Please help! Serious error! :S
item.dc:creator: @Untrimmed Untrimmed
item.description:
@Untrimmed wrote:

Use tabs, not spaces.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help! Serious error! :S
item.dc:creator: @CoreVersion CoreVersion
item.description:
@CoreVersion wrote:

Right, well thankyou both, but, i THINK, it might have something to do with item.cfg, as that was the last thing i eddited, but, what the problem is… i can’t seem to get my head around

And ideas? :S

Read full topic

item.title: Please help! Serious error! :S
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

‘17’ is out of bounds of the array being used.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help! Serious error! :S
item.dc:creator: @Roar337 Roar337
item.description:
@Roar337 wrote:

no one is replying so i will altho i dont know how to fix often time compilers tell you exactly what you need to know try looking around ItemHandler.java line 283 if its not in that line then it will be in whatever that line reffers to once again i have no clue what im talking about but its always worth a shot and plus dont complain i just bumped your post

Read full topic

item.title: Please help! Serious error! :S

item.description:
@CoreVersion wrote:

Right, i get this error when i try to run my server:

##### is now online! Players may now join! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:126)
